label: ABC_oP12_62_c_c_c-003
title: MnCuP Structure
comments:
This is our prototype for the ternary form of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_oP12_62_2c_c-001}{Co$_{2}$Si ($C7$)} structure.  See that page for similar binary compounds. 
 MnCuP and \href{current_web_home_dir/ABC_oP12_62_c_c_c-017}{laudite (CuAsS)} have the same AFLOW label, ABC\_oP12\_62\_c\_c\_c. The structures are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files. 
 The ICSD lists this structure under the prototype TiNiSi\#MgSrSi.
